name: SelectTrigger
description:
A button that opens the select menu.
Renders a `<div>` element.

disabled.description: Whether the component should ignore user interaction.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-popup-open.description: Present when the corresponding select is open.

data-pressed.description: Present when the trigger is pressed.

data-disabled.description: Present when the select is disabled.

data-readonly.description: Present when the select is readonly.

data-required.description: Present when the select is required.

data-valid.description: Present when the select is in valid state (when wrapped in Field.Root)..

data-invalid.description: Present when the select is in invalid state (when wrapped in Field.Root).

data-dirty.description: Present when the select's value has changed (when wrapped in Field.Root).

data-touched.description: Present when the select has been thouched (when wrapped in Field.Root).
